data.text: Ikia irio ciaku igũrũ rĩa maaĩ,
He andũ mũgwanja rwĩga, ĩĩ, o na ũhe andũ anana,
Mũndũ ũrĩa wothe ũcũthagĩrĩria rũhuho, ndahaandaga;
Tondũ ndũũĩ njĩra ĩrĩa rũhuho rũgeraga,
Na rĩrĩ, mũndũ o na angĩgĩtũũra muoyo mĩaka mĩingĩ atĩa-rĩ,
Atĩrĩrĩ, wee mwanake ũyũ, kenagĩra ũnini waku,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio, eheria gwĩtanga ngoro-inĩ yaku,
